form.name: form1

div.span: Orange Schools Campus closed through the end of the school year

span.div: Due to the COVID-19 pandemic, the Orange Schools campus will be closed from through the end of the school year. All activities, events, athletics, clubs, and field trips are cancelled and all facilities are closed during that time and until further notice.

a.span: Remote Learning Plans for Each School

div.span: The Orange Schools Campus will be closed through the end of the school year

The Orange Schools campus will be closed from March 16 through the end of the school year. All activities, events, athletics, clubs, and field trips are cancelled and all facilities are closed during that time and until further notice.

img.alt: To Learn. To Lead. To Make a Difference.

span.strong: Remote Learning Plans for Each School

img.alt: Students assist in stocking food pantry.
Elementary school girl displays her newly created bat
Two students paddle hard to try to keep cardboard boat afloat.
3 smiling first graders missing their front two teeth
Five little cowpoke sitting on a bench.
BMS students practice collaboration by connecting with straws.
Excited teachers hold signs welcoming the student in the foreground on the first day of school.
MHS students are happy to begin their school day after getting off the buses.
OHS student creates an atom model using marshmallows.
BMS sixth graders give a thumbs up to the renovated middle school!
OHS Volleyball players, coaches, and alumnae smile before the big game.
BMS WEB leaders support each other as they stand arm in arm, back to back.
MHS students smile as they work on their assignments.
MHS students excitedly enter the building as the high school band plays on.
Team Orange leaders display their orange spirit to kick off the school year.
MHS students join the Principal on the first day of school.
